attributes.action: Permit children with a EHCP up to 5 days of authorised absence from school
attributes.additional_details: I kindly request that you consider allowing up to 5 days of authorised absence for children with an EHCP. This would greatly benefit those who find busy, crowded environments overwhelming. Every child deserves the opportunity to enjoy a break without the added stress of sensory overload or difficulty with self-regulation.
attributes.background: I believe children with an EHCP should be granted a 5-day allowance for holidays during quieter times, helping them avoid overwhelming and crowded environments.

rejection.details:
The following petitions call for similar actions: 

Fund more support for children with SEN & allow term-time holidays 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726381

Allow families with SEN children 10 days term-time holiday without being fined
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707685
